pages.text: Do you even know what you've done? You attempt to understand us, in ignorance, and in vain.
There will be a time I come to you. You will see what I can do. And you will run in fear as you know my name. My minions will darken the skies.
A crushed, fly-like entity with a human face is smeared against this page. It also smells really bad.
There is nothing you can do to stop me. Moloch, Lilith, Herne, Leonard, Baphomet, they are all but shallow reflections in the grand scheme of things. I'm what lies underneath.
